mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gmeeting (meetingid, memberid, gno, title, content, meeting_date, location, cost, capacity) VALUES (meeting_seq.nextval, #{memberid}, #{gno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{meeting_date}, #{location}, #{cost}, #{capacity})
mapper.select: select GM.MEMBERID, GM.GNO, GM.TITLE, GM.MEETING_DATE, GM.LOCATION, GM.COST, GM.CAPACITY, GM.MEETINGID, GM.CONTENT, GM.DEADLINE_DATE, MR.NAME from GMEETING GM join MEMBER MR on MR.MEMBERID = GM.MEMBERID where GM.GNO = #{gno}

select GM.MEMBERID, GM.GNO, GM.TITLE, GM.MEETING_DATE, GM.LOCATION, GM.COST, GM.CAPACITY, GM.DEADLINE_DATE, GM.MEETINGID, GM.CONTENT, MR.NAME from GMEETING GM join MEMBER MR on MR.MEMBERID = GM.MEMBERID AND GM.MEETINGID = #{meetingid}

select GM.MEMBERID, GM.GNO, GM.TITLE, GM.MEETING_DATE, GM.LOCATION, GM.COST, GM.CAPACITY, GM.DEADLINE_DATE, GM.MEETINGID, GM.CONTENT, MR.NAME from GMEETING GM join MEMBER MR on MR.MEMBERID = GM.MEMBERID where GM.GNO = #{gno}
select TITLE, CONTENT, LOCATION, COST, CAPACITY, MEETING_DATE, GNO, MEMBERID FROM GMEETING WHERE GNO = #{gno} AND MEETINGID = #{meetingid} AND MEMBERID = #{memberid}
